summary:
=== Purchase Information === Product Title: RegenFX Skincare Anti Aging Moisturizer Cream with Vitamin C, Vitamin E, Green Tea Extracts and Hyaluronic Acid. Potent Anti-Aging, Anti-Wrinkle Treatment, Skin Tightening, and Collagen Stimulation. Net Wt 1.0 oz/ 30 ml Review Date: 2015/09/26 Store: RegenFX Skincare Product Description: ["Reset the clock and recover your skin's youth with this nourishing, sculpting, and firming cream that is infused with an energetic blend of essential oils. Formulated with RegenFX complex, this anti aging cream helps restore skins natural younger form, addressing and reversing sagging skin and loss of volume, elasticity, density and wrinkles. This all-in-one highly active energetic anti aging moisturizer focuses on cellular regeneration, lifting and wrinkles with the latest targeted peptide complexes. A joyous and energetic blend of proprietary ingredients that creates a therapeutic aromatherapy effect."] Average Rating: 3.3 Product Details: {'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Product Dimensions': '2 x 2 x 7 inches; 1.12 Ounces', 'Item model number': 'FXMOIS-1', 'UPC': '641061984320', 'Manufacturer': 'Eureka Brands LLC'} Review Text: This feels so good on your skin.It goes on in a cream form and in seconds soaks right into your face and neck.I am already telling a difference in my skin tone and fine lines.The cream comes in a pump bottle which I really like.The cream has a very light fragrance,very light.My favorite part is the intense collegen regeneration which is something every woman's skin needs.Especially the over fifty group.Thank you for letting me review this at a lower cost. Review Title: Loving This Moisturizer Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Pure Hyaluronic Acid Serum with Vitamin C for Face - Organic Anti Aging & Anti-Wrinkle Skin Treatment - Penetrates Deeply & Activates Collagen Production for a Younger, Firmer & Brighter Complexion Review Date: 2015/09/26 Store: Derma-nu Miracle Skin Remedies Average Rating: 4.0 Product Details: {'Skin Type': 'All', 'Product Benefits': 'Anti-Aging', 'Use for': 'Face', 'Scent': 'Aloe', 'Brand': 'Derma-nu Miracle Skin Remedies', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Product Dimensions': '1 x 1 x 4 inches; 1.25 Ounces', 'UPC': '787421301854'} Review Text: This is definitely a treat for your skin.It comes in a pump dispenser which I love.It comes out in a clear form.It goes on wonderfully and soaks into tourism in a matter of minutes.It is not oily or greasy.Very faint fragrance.It contains the best three anti aging ingredients,hyaluronic acid,Vitamn C and Green tea.By having all three of these ingredients you have a powerful formula for anti aging.After applying this serum let dry and use a moisturizer before putting on your make up.Thank you so much for letting me review this at a lower cost. Review Title: Magical Serum Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Eyelash Curler by Bella and Bear - Your New Lash Curlers Include a Storage Bag and Extra Refill Pads - Curl and Shape Your Eyelashes Without Pinching or Pulling Review Date: 2015/10/04 Store: Bella and Bear Average Rating: 4.2 Product Details: {'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Product Dimensions': '4 x 2 x 1 inches; 0.4 Ounces', 'Item model number': 'EC1029', 'UPC': '640626309226 794827127582', 'Manufacturer': 'Bella and Bear'} Review Text: I love everything about these eyelash curlers.The packaging is beautiful.This is one of the best beauty tools that I have used.The eyelash Curler is made very durable and high quality.They work so well it really made my eyes stand out.I am so pleaded with everything.This would be a perfect gift for the woman who has it all.Thank you for letting me review these At a lower price. Review Title: Wonderful Results Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: K + S Salon Quality Men’s Shampoo + Conditioner Set (1 Pack (8oz)) Review Date: 2015/10/15 Store: krieger + söhne Average Rating: 4.2 Product Details: {'Item Form': 'Liquid', 'Brand': 'Krieger + söhne', 'Hair Type': 'All,Dry', 'Scent': 'Tea Tree, Peppermint', 'Special Ingredients': 'Tea-tree-oil', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Product Dimensions': '2.76 x 3.54 x 6.69 inches; 1.1 Pounds', 'Item model number': '853831005351', 'UPC': '853831005351'} Review Text: What a wonderful treat for my husband.It has a minty smell which stimulates your scalp and makes your head and hair feel fantastic.A wonderful way to wake up in the shower.This would be a wonderful present for someone special in your life.Very luxurious shampoo and conditioner for men.The smell is wonderful.We are very excited about this product.Thank you so much for letting us review this at a lower price. Review Title: Gotta Have! Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: The Best Natural, Organic Anti Aging Face Serum ,this Beauty Product is an intense moisturizer for dry and sensitive skin, helps reduce appearance the of wrinkles for a smooth radiant glow Review Date: 2015/10/20 Store: The Natural Boost CompanyATOPAL Average Rating: 3.3 Product Details: {'Package Dimensions': '4.6 x 0.9 x 0.9 inches; 1.6 Ounces', 'UPC': '794168230170', 'Manufacturer': 'The Natural Boost CompanyATOPAL'} Review Text: The Natural Boost company has a Moisture Boost Serum that is fantastic.It feels like cold water going on,I would love to sink in a bathtub of this serum,it actually feels that good on your skin.It comes in a pump dispenser so the gel comes out nicely.You only apply a little bit just a drop to forehead,chin and cheeks and massage it in.Let absorb completely and apply your make up.I have been using it for a pick me up during the day.It does not leave your skin oily or greasy.Skin feels hydrated and toned.Thank you for a discount for my honest opinion. Review Title: Best Facial Hydration Serum Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Lula Lilly Shower Cap for Small and Petite Woman, Brilliant Butterfly Review Date: 2016/02/23 Store: Lula Lilly (Beauty For Smart Women) Average Rating: 3.7 Product Details: {'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Package Dimensions': '6 x 6 x 2 inches; 0.35 Ounces'} Review Text: This is absolutely perfect for me.It fits very well and I have medium long hair and all my hair fits in it.The shower cap is not uncomfortable to wear.Snug but that is how I want it.I have dry hair so it is nice to take a bath or shower and your hair is not damp.The butterfly material is kind of like a silk material while the cap inside is a very nice durable plastic.The workmanship is very good.I have used it about three times since I got it and I have a suction cup in the shower which I hang it up to dry.The shape stays the same,I believe I will get a ton of use out of this shower cap.I love that it is so pretty.The most wonderful thing about this cap for me is I have had two different surgeries on my stomach and I have to use medicine and soak at least three times a week and hotel shower caps would not keep my hair free of getting this powerful medicine on it,this one has worked absolutely wonderful.My hair is dry when I come of of one of my prescription soaks.Thank you for the discount for my honest opinion. Review Title: Works Great For Showers or Baths,Made Very Well,Plus It Is So Pretty! Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: KINGDOMCARES New Year Gifts Electric Mask Heater Essence Facial Mask Pure Natural Face Mask for Facial Treatment Reduce Wrinkles Acne Scars Blackheads Cellulite Ultimate Spa Quality Skin Care Golden Review Date: 2016/05/25 Store: KINGDOM CARES Average Rating: 3.3 Product Details: {'Brand': 'KINGDOM CARES', 'Product Benefits': 'Soften', 'Scent': 'Green Tea', 'Skin Type': 'Acne Prone', 'Special Feature': 'Not Tested On Animals', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Package Dimensions': '7.7 x 5 x 2.1 inches; 13.6 Ounces', 'UPC': '719970775442'} Review Text: [[VIDEOID:efd2e36bf2bab8b7032dbcb10aeeafa]] [[VIDEOID:b9e3c43df8c763984c125f015c45b005]] This product is wonderful,easy to use,safe and convenient.Plus I never knew this product existed until I was searching for facial masks and this came up,The Mask Heater.I did a little bit of research about warming up facial masks and the pros and cons of it.Their are no cons,the masks actually work better at a warm temperature and you do not have to worry about the mask getting to hot.I had to buy this for all of my facial masks.I am so amazed at the difference this mask heater makes my facial masks work so much better!It is something you really will love if you are a face mask person and I know that face mask's are all the rage now.The Electric mask heater is small and portable,which I love!It measures about 6 1/2 inches long and a little over 4 inches wide and is very thin,under a inch.It is so easy to use,I personally unfold my mask halfway,Lay it on the smooth part of the heater,solid part,close the cover,do not worry about the mirror,it wipes off easily, anything that gets on it,let it sit for four minutes in the heater and the mask is then suitable to put on your face.You will feel such a nice warm feeling on your face,it is addicting.The temperature that it reaches with this heater is actually the best for all the nutrients to absorb so much better into your skin. The heater heats the mask up to 45 degree's and that is the best temperature to accelerate blood flow,smooth pores,just leaves your skin so healthy looking and very hydrated!Unplug it after the four minutes and wipe your heater off including the mirror and it is ready for your next warming facial mask experience.I am a big fan of skin care and this product is going to be on everyone's wish list for the Holidays!My best friend tried it and she is already told her husband that she wants one for Christmas,Her Birthday or their Anniversary,she didn't care which one!This is really a nice way to pamper your skin and yourself and every woman deserves that!Kingdom Care has a warranty on this mask heater for two years,so they believe in the quality of their products.The workmanship is outstanding and they use the finest materials available.They include a very step by step instruction manual to guide you through the usage and taking care of your machine.Plus they include a wonderful Thank you card and if you send them a email they will give you a promo code on another one of their products,I think that is so sweet.Plus you get your warranty card.The company really cares about their customers which is very refreshing.I am so thrilled with my Electric Mask Heater and I know you will be to!!Thank you for my discount for my honest opinion. Review Title: A Must Have For All Facial Mask Lovers, Improves The Nutrients In Your Masks,Leaves Your Skin Healthy & Hydrated!Happy Customer! Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Lilian Fache Electronic Pedicure Foot File with Diamond Crystals - Electric Pedi Tool Callus Remover (no pressure required) USB Re-Chargeable - 1 Coarse and 1 Replacement Xtra Course Head, Pink Review Date: 2016/06/07 Store: Lilian Fache Product Description: ['Enjoy Smoother, Softer, And More Beautiful Looking Feet In Seconds!', 'Scrub away rough calluses, file away dead, dry skin, and give your feet the ultimate make over with our Lilan Fache Callus Remover It does this by incorporating a diamond encrusted head: \x95Quickly remove tough, stubborn, and unsightly calluses \x95Gently clear away dead, dry, and rough skin', 'Did you know 75% of Americans experience foot health problems at one point or another in their lifetime? And did you also know that women have 4X as many foot problems as men?', "That's why it's so important to pamper your feet the same way you do your face, body, and hands. Just a few seconds a day is all it takes to \x95IMPROVE YOUR FOOT HEALTH by scrubbing away nasty callus and allowing new, youthful skin to grow \x95BOOST YOUR CONFIDENCE instantly with smoother, softer, sexier feet \x95PUT AND END TO EMBARRASSING MOMENTS in bed, at yoga, or around the house \x97 now you can show off your feet everywhere", 'Experience the difference and purchase the Lilan Fache Callus Remover _ NOW', 'You will receive: \x95(1) Ergonomic Hand Held Unit •(2) Diamond incrusted Heads \x95 Protective Cap USB recharging cordCleaning Brush', 'Enjoy a Spa Quality Pedicure for Summer at Just a Fraction of the Cost'] Average Rating: 3.2 Product Details: {'Brand': 'Lilian Fache', 'Is Electric': 'Yes', 'Item Form': 'Filer', 'Style': 'Modern', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Package Dimensions': '8 x 5.6 x 1.8 inches; 8 Ounces', 'Item model number': 'BD28004', 'Batteries': '1 Lithium Ion batteries required. (included)', 'UPC': '076956146024'} Review Text: [[VIDEOID:2eb0de16876dd0dcbcdda2e41c169b28]] This is a wonderful pedicure set.Very nicely packaged.It is a rechargeable USB battery operated device,I love rechargeable beauty tools.This pedicure set will remove dead skin away from your feet the very first time you use it.It will not cut your skin which I am thrilled about because my husband is letting me do his feet and he is a Diabetic.The unit itself is very comfortable in your hand.Easy to work and see what you are doing also.Please note it has to be charged before using and mine took about five hours to charge.You have about thirty minutes of really good power and really that is perfect because it only took me about five minutes to do both feet.You will be shocked at the yucky dry skin that comes off of your feet.I seriously could not believe what this callous remover took off and I put foot cream on my feet every night.My feet feel and look so much better after two uses.I had no ideal that my feet had that much dry tough skin on them.The booklet they enclosed is very informative and please read it before using this device.They have some great tips for you and keeping your new callous remover working and looking good.Thank you for the discount for my honest opinion. Review Title: Incredible Pedicure Set,Feet Look So Much Better!Perfect For Spring & Summer!Very Happy Customer! Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Bonita Salon 6-piece Nail Polish Color Set Review Date: 2016/06/13 Store: AOBBIY Average Rating: 4.8 Product Details: {'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Package Dimensions': '7 x 4 x 3 inches; 15.2 Ounces', 'UPC': '755332718498', 'Manufacturer': 'AOBBIY'} Review Text: [[VIDEOID:624f8be6da69b485e3f73f594527f835]] This is the first time that I have ever heard of this brand of nail polish.I love the colors they are magnificent.They include the following

Primo Donno
Made To Envy
Royal Wishes
Fantasy Flowers
Dream Wonderland
True Diva
Each color goes on very nice and even.They dry very fast.I only needed two coats of polish for each nail.Very nice luxurious color.The polish set fast and I was able to go about my business in a hour without hurting my nails or messing up the polish.I wore it for over a week before I had to take it off due to chipping.I am very pleased with this nice set of fingernail polishes.I really love the deeper colors and that seems to be all the rage now.I highly recommend these nail polishes.Thank you for the discount for my honest opinion. Review Title: Luxurious Set Of Glamorous Nail Polishes,Very Stylish & Goes On Very Nicely,Happy Customer!! Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: MOKALE 6pcs Plastic Butterfly Hair Clamps-Non-Slip Chic Styling Claw Hairgrip for Women and Girls-Professional Chunky Prong Teeth Bows Jaw Hair Clips For Thick Hair (Red) Review Date: 2016/07/29 Store: Mokale Average Rating: 4.5 Product Details: {'Brand': 'Mokale', 'Hair Type': 'All', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Material': 'Plastic', 'Occasion': 'Wedding, Birthdays', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Package Dimensions': '10.4 x 4 x 1.5 inches; 0.8 Ounces', 'UPC': '714757389157 794168343665'} Review Text: [[VIDEOID:dbb1915e0e0a386c336535dbcf4c1315]] [[VIDEOID:1e7c809060a4ec56de5db8fcb7f403c8]] [[VIDEOID:e0863549f9b1b0572a9cd2c4c1b7cb47]] I have mid length hair and I dye it so I wanted to get some clips to separate my hair when I dye it.They passed the test with flying colors.They are also great just to put your hair up,especially in this heat and humidity.The hair clips stay in my hair very well and have a nice clamp,they do not feel like they are falling out like so many other hair clips do.I love the size of them.When I saw this in the advertisement I knew I wanted to try them"These hair clasps are all made of durable, best quality material and are tension sprung, which ensures firm grip, prevents them from slipping and makes this set ideal for professional hairdressers and stylists".They are also great for deep hair conditioning when you want to get to the roots,I just clamp off sections of my hair,apply the conditioner and wait for five minutes and then take the clamps out and let it sit for another few minutes.the hair clamps work awesome for this too!Very happy with these hair clips.Thank you for the discount for my honest opinion. Review Title: You Can Do So Much With These Hair Clips! Style,Dye and deep Condition Your Hair! Rating: 5.0 --------------------------------------------------

prompt:
Based on the provided purchase history, generate three separate summaries focusing on different aspects of the user's experiences. Each summary should be under 256 words. Focus only on keywords and clear trends supported by multiple interactions. Do not repeat specific product names or details. avoid repeating product names, specifications, or technical details: 1. POSITIVE: Describe only the positive experiences and what was liked. 2. NEGATIVE: Describe only the negative experiences and what was disliked. 3. OVERALL: Provide a overall summary including both positive and negative aspects. Here's the purchase data: === Purchase Information === Product Title: RegenFX Skincare Anti Aging Moisturizer Cream with Vitamin C, Vitamin E, Green Tea Extracts and Hyaluronic Acid. Potent Anti-Aging, Anti-Wrinkle Treatment, Skin Tightening, and Collagen Stimulation. Net Wt 1.0 oz/ 30 ml Review Date: 2015/09/26 Store: RegenFX Skincare Product Description: ["Reset the clock and recover your skin's youth with this nourishing, sculpting, and firming cream that is infused with an energetic blend of essential oils. Formulated with RegenFX complex, this anti aging cream helps restore skins natural younger form, addressing and reversing sagging skin and loss of volume, elasticity, density and wrinkles. This all-in-one highly active energetic anti aging moisturizer focuses on cellular regeneration, lifting and wrinkles with the latest targeted peptide complexes. A joyous and energetic blend of proprietary ingredients that creates a therapeutic aromatherapy effect."] Average Rating: 3.3 Product Details: {'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Product Dimensions': '2 x 2 x 7 inches; 1.12 Ounces', 'Item model number': 'FXMOIS-1', 'UPC': '641061984320', 'Manufacturer': 'Eureka Brands LLC'} Review Text: This feels so good on your skin.It goes on in a cream form and in seconds soaks right into your face and neck.I am already telling a difference in my skin tone and fine lines.The cream comes in a pump bottle which I really like.The cream has a very light fragrance,very light.My favorite part is the intense collegen regeneration which is something every woman's skin needs.Especially the over fifty group.Thank you for letting me review this at a lower cost. Review Title: Loving This Moisturizer Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Pure Hyaluronic Acid Serum with Vitamin C for Face - Organic Anti Aging & Anti-Wrinkle Skin Treatment - Penetrates Deeply & Activates Collagen Production for a Younger, Firmer & Brighter Complexion Review Date: 2015/09/26 Store: Derma-nu Miracle Skin Remedies Average Rating: 4.0 Product Details: {'Skin Type': 'All', 'Product Benefits': 'Anti-Aging', 'Use for': 'Face', 'Scent': 'Aloe', 'Brand': 'Derma-nu Miracle Skin Remedies', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Product Dimensions': '1 x 1 x 4 inches; 1.25 Ounces', 'UPC': '787421301854'} Review Text: This is definitely a treat for your skin.It comes in a pump dispenser which I love.It comes out in a clear form.It goes on wonderfully and soaks into tourism in a matter of minutes.It is not oily or greasy.Very faint fragrance.It contains the best three anti aging ingredients,hyaluronic acid,Vitamn C and Green tea.By having all three of these ingredients you have a powerful formula for anti aging.After applying this serum let dry and use a moisturizer before putting on your make up.Thank you so much for letting me review this at a lower cost. Review Title: Magical Serum Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Eyelash Curler by Bella and Bear - Your New Lash Curlers Include a Storage Bag and Extra Refill Pads - Curl and Shape Your Eyelashes Without Pinching or Pulling Review Date: 2015/10/04 Store: Bella and Bear Average Rating: 4.2 Product Details: {'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Product Dimensions': '4 x 2 x 1 inches; 0.4 Ounces', 'Item model number': 'EC1029', 'UPC': '640626309226 794827127582', 'Manufacturer': 'Bella and Bear'} Review Text: I love everything about these eyelash curlers.The packaging is beautiful.This is one of the best beauty tools that I have used.The eyelash Curler is made very durable and high quality.They work so well it really made my eyes stand out.I am so pleaded with everything.This would be a perfect gift for the woman who has it all.Thank you for letting me review these At a lower price. Review Title: Wonderful Results Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: K + S Salon Quality Men’s Shampoo + Conditioner Set (1 Pack (8oz)) Review Date: 2015/10/15 Store: krieger + söhne Average Rating: 4.2 Product Details: {'Item Form': 'Liquid', 'Brand': 'Krieger + söhne', 'Hair Type': 'All,Dry', 'Scent': 'Tea Tree, Peppermint', 'Special Ingredients': 'Tea-tree-oil', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Product Dimensions': '2.76 x 3.54 x 6.69 inches; 1.1 Pounds', 'Item model number': '853831005351', 'UPC': '853831005351'} Review Text: What a wonderful treat for my husband.It has a minty smell which stimulates your scalp and makes your head and hair feel fantastic.A wonderful way to wake up in the shower.This would be a wonderful present for someone special in your life.Very luxurious shampoo and conditioner for men.The smell is wonderful.We are very excited about this product.Thank you so much for letting us review this at a lower price. Review Title: Gotta Have! Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: The Best Natural, Organic Anti Aging Face Serum ,this Beauty Product is an intense moisturizer for dry and sensitive skin, helps reduce appearance the of wrinkles for a smooth radiant glow Review Date: 2015/10/20 Store: The Natural Boost CompanyATOPAL Average Rating: 3.3 Product Details: {'Package Dimensions': '4.6 x 0.9 x 0.9 inches; 1.6 Ounces', 'UPC': '794168230170', 'Manufacturer': 'The Natural Boost CompanyATOPAL'} Review Text: The Natural Boost company has a Moisture Boost Serum that is fantastic.It feels like cold water going on,I would love to sink in a bathtub of this serum,it actually feels that good on your skin.It comes in a pump dispenser so the gel comes out nicely.You only apply a little bit just a drop to forehead,chin and cheeks and massage it in.Let absorb completely and apply your make up.I have been using it for a pick me up during the day.It does not leave your skin oily or greasy.Skin feels hydrated and toned.Thank you for a discount for my honest opinion. Review Title: Best Facial Hydration Serum Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Lula Lilly Shower Cap for Small and Petite Woman, Brilliant Butterfly Review Date: 2016/02/23 Store: Lula Lilly (Beauty For Smart Women) Average Rating: 3.7 Product Details: {'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Package Dimensions': '6 x 6 x 2 inches; 0.35 Ounces'} Review Text: This is absolutely perfect for me.It fits very well and I have medium long hair and all my hair fits in it.The shower cap is not uncomfortable to wear.Snug but that is how I want it.I have dry hair so it is nice to take a bath or shower and your hair is not damp.The butterfly material is kind of like a silk material while the cap inside is a very nice durable plastic.The workmanship is very good.I have used it about three times since I got it and I have a suction cup in the shower which I hang it up to dry.The shape stays the same,I believe I will get a ton of use out of this shower cap.I love that it is so pretty.The most wonderful thing about this cap for me is I have had two different surgeries on my stomach and I have to use medicine and soak at least three times a week and hotel shower caps would not keep my hair free of getting this powerful medicine on it,this one has worked absolutely wonderful.My hair is dry when I come of of one of my prescription soaks.Thank you for the discount for my honest opinion. Review Title: Works Great For Showers or Baths,Made Very Well,Plus It Is So Pretty! Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: KINGDOMCARES New Year Gifts Electric Mask Heater Essence Facial Mask Pure Natural Face Mask for Facial Treatment Reduce Wrinkles Acne Scars Blackheads Cellulite Ultimate Spa Quality Skin Care Golden Review Date: 2016/05/25 Store: KINGDOM CARES Average Rating: 3.3 Product Details: {'Brand': 'KINGDOM CARES', 'Product Benefits': 'Soften', 'Scent': 'Green Tea', 'Skin Type': 'Acne Prone', 'Special Feature': 'Not Tested On Animals', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Package Dimensions': '7.7 x 5 x 2.1 inches; 13.6 Ounces', 'UPC': '719970775442'} Review Text: [[VIDEOID:efd2e36bf2bab8b7032dbcb10aeeafa]] [[VIDEOID:b9e3c43df8c763984c125f015c45b005]] This product is wonderful,easy to use,safe and convenient.Plus I never knew this product existed until I was searching for facial masks and this came up,The Mask Heater.I did a little bit of research about warming up facial masks and the pros and cons of it.Their are no cons,the masks actually work better at a warm temperature and you do not have to worry about the mask getting to hot.I had to buy this for all of my facial masks.I am so amazed at the difference this mask heater makes my facial masks work so much better!It is something you really will love if you are a face mask person and I know that face mask's are all the rage now.The Electric mask heater is small and portable,which I love!It measures about 6 1/2 inches long and a little over 4 inches wide and is very thin,under a inch.It is so easy to use,I personally unfold my mask halfway,Lay it on the smooth part of the heater,solid part,close the cover,do not worry about the mirror,it wipes off easily, anything that gets on it,let it sit for four minutes in the heater and the mask is then suitable to put on your face.You will feel such a nice warm feeling on your face,it is addicting.The temperature that it reaches with this heater is actually the best for all the nutrients to absorb so much better into your skin. The heater heats the mask up to 45 degree's and that is the best temperature to accelerate blood flow,smooth pores,just leaves your skin so healthy looking and very hydrated!Unplug it after the four minutes and wipe your heater off including the mirror and it is ready for your next warming facial mask experience.I am a big fan of skin care and this product is going to be on everyone's wish list for the Holidays!My best friend tried it and she is already told her husband that she wants one for Christmas,Her Birthday or their Anniversary,she didn't care which one!This is really a nice way to pamper your skin and yourself and every woman deserves that!Kingdom Care has a warranty on this mask heater for two years,so they believe in the quality of their products.The workmanship is outstanding and they use the finest materials available.They include a very step by step instruction manual to guide you through the usage and taking care of your machine.Plus they include a wonderful Thank you card and if you send them a email they will give you a promo code on another one of their products,I think that is so sweet.Plus you get your warranty card.The company really cares about their customers which is very refreshing.I am so thrilled with my Electric Mask Heater and I know you will be to!!Thank you for my discount for my honest opinion. Review Title: A Must Have For All Facial Mask Lovers, Improves The Nutrients In Your Masks,Leaves Your Skin Healthy & Hydrated!Happy Customer! Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Lilian Fache Electronic Pedicure Foot File with Diamond Crystals - Electric Pedi Tool Callus Remover (no pressure required) USB Re-Chargeable - 1 Coarse and 1 Replacement Xtra Course Head, Pink Review Date: 2016/06/07 Store: Lilian Fache Product Description: ['Enjoy Smoother, Softer, And More Beautiful Looking Feet In Seconds!', 'Scrub away rough calluses, file away dead, dry skin, and give your feet the ultimate make over with our Lilan Fache Callus Remover It does this by incorporating a diamond encrusted head: \x95Quickly remove tough, stubborn, and unsightly calluses \x95Gently clear away dead, dry, and rough skin', 'Did you know 75% of Americans experience foot health problems at one point or another in their lifetime? And did you also know that women have 4X as many foot problems as men?', "That's why it's so important to pamper your feet the same way you do your face, body, and hands. Just a few seconds a day is all it takes to \x95IMPROVE YOUR FOOT HEALTH by scrubbing away nasty callus and allowing new, youthful skin to grow \x95BOOST YOUR CONFIDENCE instantly with smoother, softer, sexier feet \x95PUT AND END TO EMBARRASSING MOMENTS in bed, at yoga, or around the house \x97 now you can show off your feet everywhere", 'Experience the difference and purchase the Lilan Fache Callus Remover _ NOW', 'You will receive: \x95(1) Ergonomic Hand Held Unit •(2) Diamond incrusted Heads \x95 Protective Cap USB recharging cordCleaning Brush', 'Enjoy a Spa Quality Pedicure for Summer at Just a Fraction of the Cost'] Average Rating: 3.2 Product Details: {'Brand': 'Lilian Fache', 'Is Electric': 'Yes', 'Item Form': 'Filer', 'Style': 'Modern', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Package Dimensions': '8 x 5.6 x 1.8 inches; 8 Ounces', 'Item model number': 'BD28004', 'Batteries': '1 Lithium Ion batteries required. (included)', 'UPC': '076956146024'} Review Text: [[VIDEOID:2eb0de16876dd0dcbcdda2e41c169b28]] This is a wonderful pedicure set.Very nicely packaged.It is a rechargeable USB battery operated device,I love rechargeable beauty tools.This pedicure set will remove dead skin away from your feet the very first time you use it.It will not cut your skin which I am thrilled about because my husband is letting me do his feet and he is a Diabetic.The unit itself is very comfortable in your hand.Easy to work and see what you are doing also.Please note it has to be charged before using and mine took about five hours to charge.You have about thirty minutes of really good power and really that is perfect because it only took me about five minutes to do both feet.You will be shocked at the yucky dry skin that comes off of your feet.I seriously could not believe what this callous remover took off and I put foot cream on my feet every night.My feet feel and look so much better after two uses.I had no ideal that my feet had that much dry tough skin on them.The booklet they enclosed is very informative and please read it before using this device.They have some great tips for you and keeping your new callous remover working and looking good.Thank you for the discount for my honest opinion. Review Title: Incredible Pedicure Set,Feet Look So Much Better!Perfect For Spring & Summer!Very Happy Customer! Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Bonita Salon 6-piece Nail Polish Color Set Review Date: 2016/06/13 Store: AOBBIY Average Rating: 4.8 Product Details: {'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Package Dimensions': '7 x 4 x 3 inches; 15.2 Ounces', 'UPC': '755332718498', 'Manufacturer': 'AOBBIY'} Review Text: [[VIDEOID:624f8be6da69b485e3f73f594527f835]] This is the first time that I have ever heard of this brand of nail polish.I love the colors they are magnificent.They include the following

Primo Donno
Made To Envy
Royal Wishes
Fantasy Flowers
Dream Wonderland
True Diva
Each color goes on very nice and even.They dry very fast.I only needed two coats of polish for each nail.Very nice luxurious color.The polish set fast and I was able to go about my business in a hour without hurting my nails or messing up the polish.I wore it for over a week before I had to take it off due to chipping.I am very pleased with this nice set of fingernail polishes.I really love the deeper colors and that seems to be all the rage now.I highly recommend these nail polishes.Thank you for the discount for my honest opinion. Review Title: Luxurious Set Of Glamorous Nail Polishes,Very Stylish & Goes On Very Nicely,Happy Customer!! Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: MOKALE 6pcs Plastic Butterfly Hair Clamps-Non-Slip Chic Styling Claw Hairgrip for Women and Girls-Professional Chunky Prong Teeth Bows Jaw Hair Clips For Thick Hair (Red) Review Date: 2016/07/29 Store: Mokale Average Rating: 4.5 Product Details: {'Brand': 'Mokale', 'Hair Type': 'All', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Material': 'Plastic', 'Occasion': 'Wedding, Birthdays', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Package Dimensions': '10.4 x 4 x 1.5 inches; 0.8 Ounces', 'UPC': '714757389157 794168343665'} Review Text: [[VIDEOID:dbb1915e0e0a386c336535dbcf4c1315]] [[VIDEOID:1e7c809060a4ec56de5db8fcb7f403c8]] [[VIDEOID:e0863549f9b1b0572a9cd2c4c1b7cb47]] I have mid length hair and I dye it so I wanted to get some clips to separate my hair when I dye it.They passed the test with flying colors.They are also great just to put your hair up,especially in this heat and humidity.The hair clips stay in my hair very well and have a nice clamp,they do not feel like they are falling out like so many other hair clips do.I love the size of them.When I saw this in the advertisement I knew I wanted to try them"These hair clasps are all made of durable, best quality material and are tension sprung, which ensures firm grip, prevents them from slipping and makes this set ideal for professional hairdressers and stylists".They are also great for deep hair conditioning when you want to get to the roots,I just clamp off sections of my hair,apply the conditioner and wait for five minutes and then take the clamps out and let it sit for another few minutes.the hair clamps work awesome for this too!Very happy with these hair clips.Thank you for the discount for my honest opinion. Review Title: You Can Do So Much With These Hair Clips! Style,Dye and deep Condition Your Hair! Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- Format your response exactly as follows: POSITIVE SUMMARY: [Your positive summary here] NEGATIVE SUMMARY: [Your negative summary here] OVERALL SUMMARY: [Your overall summary here]
raw_response:
POSITIVE SUMMARY:
The user has had numerous positive experiences with their purchases. They appreciated the nourishing and rejuvenating effects of skincare products, noting improvements in skin tone and fine lines. The pump dispensers of serums and moisturizers were particularly liked for their ease of use and ability to absorb quickly. Users also highlighted the luxurious feel and high-quality craftsmanship of beauty tools, expressing satisfaction with the results achieved from using eyelash curlers, shampoos, and nail polishes. Additionally, the shower cap received praise for its perfect fit and effectiveness in keeping hair dry, while the electric mask heater was celebrated for enhancing the efficacy of facial treatments, indicating the user's overall enjoyment of pampering and self-care.

NEGATIVE SUMMARY:
Despite many positive reviews, some products received mixed feedback. Certain skincare items had average ratings, indicating that while effects were noted, some users expected more significant results. The nail polish and pedicure foot file, despite overall satisfaction, highlighted experiences of temporary efficacy and performance inconsistencies in use over time. Additionally, while the shower cap was mostly well-received, it received a less enthusiastic response concerning its comparison to other options, suggesting a potential need for improvement in comfort or performance.

OVERALL SUMMARY:
The user displays a clear trend toward appreciating high-quality beauty and skincare products that deliver on their promises, with a particular fondness for well-packaged items that enhance the experience. Positive sentiments dominate, reflecting satisfaction with the effectiveness of skincare and beauty tools, and a penchant for self-care rituals. However, there are a few instances of dissatisfaction or moderate responses to certain products, emphasizing occasional gaps in result expectations. This blend of enthusiasm and constructive critique paints a balanced picture of their purchasing experience.

target_interaction.title: Very Handy For Purse,Car & Hospital's!The Tools Are Very Nice & Work Well!
target_interaction.text: This is a very nice manicure and pedicure set for either a woman or a man!My husband needed one when he was in the hospital and this small but mighty case was perfect for him.The case actually is not girlish at all.t has a very nice plaid design with some dark red stripes running through it,The case is small and it measures a little over four inches and almost three inches,perfect for your purse,car or the Hospital when you need it.The Hospital did not have a foot Doctor on so I had to keep his toenails and fingernails clipped and him being diabetic is scary.I have to say the slanted clippers and the larger rounded ones did a fantastic job,we were both very pleased.He uses the scissors and nail file and of course the tweezers,but he has right by his sink.The tools are all made with very nice materials and the workmanship is very good!This is a great little case for anyone looking for something small.Thank you for the discount for my honest opinion.
target_interaction.title_meta: Manicure Pedicure Set Nail Clippers Cutters Stainless Steel Professional Toenail Clippers Nail Scissors Grooming Kit for Men Women,Travel Case,10pcs
